entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 3:15 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
